contextId.information: This means basically the same thing as the first question. This rhetorical question expresses surprise that humans are not important enough for God to care for them. AT: "No human is worthy enough for you to care for him!" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: Or a son of man, that you care for him?
